channel.title: CVE Feed for PyForum -- PyForum

item.title: CVE-2009-5025|2024-08-07T07:24:53.774Z -- pyforum -- pyforum
item.description: A backdoor (aka BMSA-2009-07) was found in PyForum v1.0.3 where an attacker who knows a valid user email could force a password reset on behalf of that user.
